casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jamal M. WATSON 107P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2018

Ms. Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General

Mr. Daniel F. Read, Attorney at Law, for Watson, Jamal M. Mr. Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for State

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of April 2018 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of April 2018."
